backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining Note, ImportantNote, and Book types with CRUD operations including add, get, delete, view count increment, and subject/featured filtering for each entity type.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that defines the actor state shape (notes, importantNotes, books maps) and exports a no-op `run` function that passes the old state through unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing three implemented features: delete note with confirmation, book upload form, and Open Note/PDF button, each mapped to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of all frontend source files describing each component, page, hook, and config file's purpose and key functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, primary, accent, chart, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point titled 'StudyShare' with a root div and a module script tag loading the React app from src/main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with a Layout wrapper (Navbar + Outlet + Footer) and defines seven routes: home, browse-notes, share-notes, important-notes, books, note detail, and important-note detail.
frontend/src/components/BookCard.tsx: Reusable card component for displaying a book with cover image or placeholder, subject badge, author, description, important star indicator, and an Access Book button that opens the download link in a new tab.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: App footer displaying the StudyHub logo, dynamic copyright year, and a caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM parameters derived from the current hostname.
frontend/src/components/ImportantNoteCar: Renders a card UI for an ImportantNote, supporting a featured variant with a star badge and accent styling, and a standard variant with subject tag and date.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Sticky top navigation bar with logo, desktop nav links, and a collapsible mobile menu, highlighting the active route using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/NoteCard.tsx: Displays a Note as a card with subject color-coding, uploader info, view count, and a button to open the note as a PDF or navigate to its detail page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated) using TanStack Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider context and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY AuthClient login, logout, and identity state with status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes TanStack Query hooks for all backend operations including CRUD for Notes, ImportantNotes, and Books, wiring each to the actor from useActor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts (Merriweather, Inter), sets up Tailwind CSS, and defines CSS custom properties for a light/dark academic warm color palette along with utility classes like paper-texture and card-hover.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with TanStack QueryClientProvider and a custom InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/BooksPage.tsx: Page for browsing and adding study books, featuring search/filter controls by subject and importance, a book card grid, and a dialog form with validation for submitting new books via the useAddBook mutation.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseNotesPage.tsx: Page that displays all student-shared notes in a filterable grid, supporting search by title/description and filtering by subject, with loading skeletons and empty/error states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page featuring a hero banner, live stats (note/book counts), and feature cards linking to Browse Notes, Important Notes, and Books sections.
frontend/src/pages/ImportantNoteDetailPa: Detail view for a single important note, fetched by decoded title from URL params, displaying subject badge, featured status, creation date, and full note content with loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/ImportantNotesPage.ts: Page listing curated important notes split into featured and non-featured sections, with search and subject filter controls, loading skeletons, and navigation to individual note detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/NoteDetailPage.tsx: Displays the full detail view of a single note identified by URL title param, including metadata, PDF viewer/download, and delete functionality with confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ShareNotesPage.tsx: Provides a form page for students to submit new notes with title, subject, description, text content, uploader name, and optional PDF upload, submitting via the addNote mutation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, custom color tokens (using oklch CSS variables), typography, border radius, box shadows, and animation keyframes for the app's academic visual theme.
project_state.json: Tracks the project's current state including version, feature list, known issues (broken note sharing), and architectural notes for the study platform.
